LanguageData.StuffEffectMultiplierArmor.label: Armor - Material effect multiplier
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.label: Броня - гострої зброї
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Sharp.description: Armor against sharp damage like bullets, knife stabs, explosions, and animal bites.\n\nThis is the percentage chance that an attack will be affected by the armor. Once the damage is affected, there is a 50% chance it will be deflected entirely, and a 50% chance it will be partially absorbed and converted into a half-damage blunt impact. Many attacks have armor penetration that will cancel part of this armor rating.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.label: Броня - тупої зброї
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Blunt.description: Armor against blunt damage like fists, club impacts and rock falls.\n\nThis is the percentage chance that an attack will be affected by the armor. Once the damage is affected, there is a 50% chance it will be deflected entirely, and a 50% chance it will be partially absorbed and have damage reduced by half. Many attacks have armor penetration that will cancel part of this armor rating.
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.label: Броня - великих температур
LanguageData.ArmorRating_Heat.description: Armor against temperature-related damage like burns.\n\nThis is the percentage chance that an attack will be affected by the armor. Once the damage is affected, there is a 50% chance it will be deflected entirely, and a 50% chance it will be partially absorbed and have damage reduced by half. Some attacks may have armor penetration that will cancel part of this armor rating.
LanguageData.Insulation_Cold.label: Захист - холоду
LanguageData.Insulation_Cold.description: How much this apparel improves a wearer's minimum comfortable temperature. Greater values allow surviving in colder temperatures.
LanguageData.Insulation_Heat.label: Захист - жара
LanguageData.Insulation_Heat.description: How much this apparel improves a wearer's maximum comfortable temperature. Greater values allow surviving in warmer temperatures.
LanguageData.EnergyShieldEnergyMax.label: Заряд щита
LanguageData.EnergyShieldEnergyMax.description: The maximum energy a shield belt can have at one time. More energy absorbs more damage.
LanguageData.EnergyShieldRechargeRate.label: Швидкість перезарядки енергощита
LanguageData.EnergyShieldRechargeRate.description: Швидкість, з якою енергощит заряджається, поки він не зламається.
LanguageData.SmokepopBeltRadius.label: Радіус димової завіси
LanguageData.SmokepopBeltRadius.description: Розмір території, яку покриє пояс-димзавіса після активації.
LanguageData.EquipDelay.label: equip delay
LanguageData.EquipDelay.description: The time it takes to equip and unequip this item.
